General.Name: Mercan Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Mercan Kimya Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces, buys, and sells paraffin, emulsion, petroleum jelly, vaseline, liquid paraffin, and other products in Turkey and internationally. The company buys and sells cosmetics, detergents, and industrial products. Mercan Kimya Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Denizli, Turkey.
